base.Title: JACQUEMUS LE CHIQUITO BROWN SUEDE
base.Body (HTML):
Signature mini handbag

- Suede leather structured bag
- Reinforced handle
- Magnetic flap closure
- Long removable strap
- Engraved lobster clip
- Gold metal logo and hardware
- Fully lined in cotton
- Dyed edges
- 12 x 9 cm



100% Cowskin
Made in Italy

base.Title: JACQUEMUS LE PETIT BAMBINO WHITE
base.Body (HTML): Jacquemus revisits its iconic 'Le Bambino' bag in an irresistible 'Petit' size. Crafted from hand-selected leather in White, this accessory is detailed with a glossy gold-tone 'J' to match the exaggerated clasps. Keep yours in the dust bag between uses.

base.Title: JACQUEMUS LE CHIQUITO HOMME BEIGE
base.Body (HTML): Inspired by the original Chiquito by Jacquemus, this masculine version of the mini bag will have you jumping on the paradoxically big trend of late. Presented in leather with the iconic logo, it features a removable shoulder strap with a leather insert, magnetic closure, and an interior card pocket.
